name: Brainiac Total Mayhem
description:
Warning: This game can only be played with gamepad, that supports vibration/rumble, and it requires 3 of them.

Three Friends, One bomb, when the time is up the bomb explodes. Be sure that you don't have it when the time comes.

You know that you have or that you have passed the bomb when you controller vibrates. Your friends have no clue of what is going on. Advice? Keep it that way.

ABILITIES:

Bomb - When close to a player you can pass the bomb.

Taunt - Use this to give some hints of who you are.

CONTROLS:
(Assuming that we are talking about an xbox scheme)

A - Bomb
B - Taunt
Left Stick - Move
